reviews.review: Игра офигенная, решил в нее поиграть познднова то, но она мне очень зашла! Жду 3 часть!

Игра просто класс!!! Вот только мне грустно из за того что я и многие люди ждут выход третей части и эпизоды к ней но их не делают мне бы если честно дать пенок Гейбу под зад что-бы скорее сделал её...
Пиздатая игра. Невъебенная игра. Настоящее цифровое золото

Да. Халва не зря является легендой, звание заслуженно.
Эта игра мне понравилась тем,что оружие тут поднимается автоматически. Half-life 2- это хороший шутан, очень резкий, немного истории оживляет её, превращает не просто в шетер.

Fizyka w grach nigdy nie będzie lepsza.




chyba że w hl3 hehe.

it could have been shorter, but it still managed to surprise me how well the first half holds up, the second half is kinda shit cause it forces you into so much fucking combat. And the combat isn't particularly fun when its being shoveled at you like shit out of Hurtmaster's mouth, its only really fun in short bursts where you can use the environment to your advantage, which isn't really the case in the later half of the game.

yes, buy this game, its good, but i don't understand the cult-like worshiping status that this game and its prequel have reached.
çok harika bi oyun bunun 1. cisini ilk oynayın sonra bunu
Халфа, она и в Африке - халфа.
This Game Is Still Relavant Goddamit!!!

Half-Life 2 is without a doubt one of the best FPS games I've ever played. I purchased the game when it was originally released back in 2004, this was the time when Doom 3, another pivotal game to spur the FPS craze that continues till this day. All my friends, family, and co-workers have experienced this genre defining FPS with its in-game cinematic cut scenes that don't break from the game's story, the unique weapons that are a blast to shoot, and the fun level design that is a pleasure to navigate through. I would strongly recommend this game to anyone new to FPS. Even hardcore veterans of the genre can't go wrong with this innovative title.
One of the greatest FPS games of all time.

Its got everything a guy could want in a game. Masculine hero. Feminine sidekick. Robotic "dog." Alien beasties. Puzzles to solve. Asses to kick. Whole lot of fun.
Classic, definitely one of the best and most important games of all time!

This game, more than a decade later, absolutely holds up. As a new fan who just got into Half Life at the end of last year just after the announcement of Half Life Alyx, I came into this game with extremely high expectations, and it passed those with flying colors. Now, on to episode 1 and 2

Source motoru ve getirdiği yenilikler bu oyunun bu denli güzel olmasında ki en büyük etken olsa gerek.
Her ne kadar 16 yıl önce çıkmış bir oyun olsa da; oyunun mekanikleri, karakterlerin yüzleri ve mimikleri, oyunun mekanlara göre değişen inanılmaz sesleri, oyunun atmosferiyle uyumlu müzikleri ve eklenen yeni silahlar çıktığı yıla göre inanılmaz. Bana kalırsa oyundaki en güzel şey Gravity Gun olayı. Çevremizdeki nesneleri düşmanlara karşı kullanabilmek, uzaktaki nesneleri rahat bir şekilde kendimize çekebilmek çok eğlenceli. İndirimleri bekleyerek çok uygun bir fiyata tüm serisini alabilirsiniz.
自分の創造性を豊かにしてくれるゲームです。
